title: A Life Of Peace Wellness Institute Class Specials
description: A Life Of Peace Wellness Institute on ALOP events, retreats, classes and certifications.
text:
Especiales de clase comunitaria
Primavera 2021
No es válido junto con otras ofertas o becas ALOP. Todas las matrículas especiales no son reembolsables.
Rhythms of Ghana Dance-Fitness Experience 2023
A Life Of Peace has teamed up with the AFRIMUDA Foundation in Cape Coast, Ghana to offer a fantastic 2 to 4 week GUEST STUDENTS PROGRAM (GSP)
The Guest Students Program offers opportunity to students and lovers of African music and dance to acquire or upgrade their artistic skills in African rhythms and movements. At AFRIMUDA, we have able and professional master drummer instructors who are capable of helping you to play intricate African rhythms with ease. Learn Ghana Traditional dance with AFRIMUDA dance instructors who will provide you the skills and experience to become proficient in dance techniques with easy movements in multiple dances such as Tokpei, Kpatsa, Obolo, Bima and more! We have designed courses to suit every level. There are courses for beginners, courses for intermediary level and courses for advance level. 3 set of dates to choose from!
Your all-inclusive package includes all classes, lodging, 2 meals/day, airport transfers, and group site seeing.
Once registration is complete, you will receive a Get Ready: Rhythms of Ghana Package with:
Information about current travel to Ghana:
Transportation, Food, Shopping, Lodging, Safety, US Consulate in Ghana, Cultural Norms, Language, Places to Visit on your Free Time
Passport and Visa Requirements
COVID Travel Information
Details on Flight Recommendations
What to Bring
Training Curriculum
Refund Policy
2 Week Program
February 13 - 25, 2023
Arrival Accra Kotoko International Airport (ACC)
Lodging: Private Accommodations in Cape Coast, Ghana
Meals: Vegan/Vegetarian Healthy Cuisine 2/day
Weekend Excursion: Cape Coast Castle Tour, Kakum National Park, Enjoy local festivals and Cape Coast Cultural Entertainments
Drum and Dance Workshops include:
1. Tokpei
2. Kpatsa
3. Obolo
4. Bima
Registration now open!
4 Week Program
February 13 - March 11, 2023
Arrival Accra Kotoko International Airport (ACC)
Lodging: Private Accommodations in Cape Coast, Ghana
Meals: Vegan/Vegetarian Healthy Cuisine 2/day
Weekend Excursion: Cape Coast Castle Tour, Kakum National Park, Kukyeku Bamboo Orchestra Village Day Trip, Enjoy local festivals and Cape Coast Cultural Entertainments
Additional Drum and Dance Workshops include:
1. Kpanlogo
2. Kukuga
3. Dambawa
4. Gahu
Registration now open!
